title: Joe Weller supports Logan Paul and slams KSI 'cringe' press conference
text:
KSI came off worse from the press conference according to Joe Weller (Picture: Getty Images)

YouTube star Joe Weller is definitely Team Logan Paul after he squared up to KSI at their UK press conference.

Logan and KSI are going to get in the boxing ring again next month, but before that there was some trash talking to be done.

They both appeared at a press conference in East London on Monday night where the back and forth insults came quick and fast.

KSI taunted his opponent by turning up with a dog similar to the one Logan used to own, a Pomeranian called Kong da Savage, who was killed by a coyote in April.

Logan then fired back with a diss about abortion alleging that KSI, real name Olajide William ‘JJ’ Olatunji, was ‘on his fifth abortion’.

Paying close attention was Joe, who claimed that KSI and taken the L in their meeting.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He tweeted: ‘To be fair as much of an absolute weirdo Logan was I do feel like he took the W on that – JJ seemed triggered throughout and just repeated old jokes and as cringe as it was, Logan’s confidence ran the show. Overall much better than the LA presser.’

The whole ordeal started after KSI won in a boxing match against British YouTuber Joe Weller. KSI took his victory to call out Logan which began this entire crazy buzz.

The rematch is due to take place at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Saturday 9 November.

The first match ended in a majority draw following six rounds of sparring – in an evening which also saw Logan’s brother Jake Paul go head to head with KSI’s brother Deji.

The YouTube stars will face off next month (Picture: Getty Images)

At the time Logan called for a rematch, saying: ‘I think it’s what the people want. Let’s give them a motherf*****g rematch!’ KSI was in agreement as he declared:

‘Let’s do that again, that was fun. Holy shit.’

KSI doesn’t want Logan to be the only Paul that he takes on in the ring, as he also his sights set on Logan’s brother Jake.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking exclusively to TMZ, KSI said: ‘I want to fight Jake Paul, man. I really want to break his face.’

KSI – real name Olajide William ‘JJ’ Olatunji – and Logan’s first match ended in a draw, but if there was a winner Jake would have been next in line to take the novice boxer on.

‘I would love to break Jake’s face as well as Logan’s. I personally don’t think, as soon as I knock out Logan, I don’t think he’s gonna want to fight me,’ he said.

description: Joe Weller supports Logan Paul and slams KSI 'cringe' press conference ahead of fight
